deity_description: The eternal goddess of the Golden Order and vessel of the Greater Will, whose inscrutable presence shapes the very fabric of the Lands Between.
The first Elden Lord and a stalwart champion of the Golden Order, renowned for his martial prowess and unyielding honor.
A charismatic and formidable warrior, Radagon embodies both mortal strength and divine legacy, his life intertwined with both valor and mystery.
The enigmatic Queen of the Full Moon and master of sorcery at the Academy of Raya Lucaria, whose arcane wisdom is steeped in lunar mysteries.
A cherished demigod of divine heritage, whose brief life and luminous legacy continue to echo through the annals of the Lands Between.
Known as the Omen King, Morgott is a tragic demigod burdened by a cursed fate, a living testament to the darker undercurrents of divine legacy.
The Lord of Blood, Mohg commands a sinister realm of corruption and raw, dark power, marked by rituals steeped in ancestral malice.
Radahn, the Starscourge, is a legendary demigod whose colossal martial might and celestial influence have etched him into the lore of epic battle.
Ranni the Witch is a mysterious and defiant demigod, weaving her own destiny through profound arcane power and a determination to reshape fate.
